title: Colin Kaepernick, Trump, Kim Kardashian, James Harden, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Colin Kaepernick, Trump, Kim Kardashian, James Harden, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
Trump throws some low key shade at Colin Kaepernick. Kim Kardashian is cussing on Ellen's show. James Harden the fashionista or nah? Junior is devastated following the results of the Daytime Emmys. The Closing Remarks will focus on the act of forgiveness and more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
